languages.text: На когитатор наложена печать молчания, но вскрыть ее нетрудно — духа машины уже сломили и измучали раньше, вырвав из его памяти каждую крупицу полезного знания.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Когитатор был взломан и извечь из него информацию не представляется возможным.

languages.text: There is a seal of silence on the cogitator, but it is not difficult to break it. The machine spirit has been tormented — someone ripped every bit of useful knowledge from its memory.
languages.original_text: На когитатор наложена печать молчания, но вскрыть ее нетрудно — духа машины уже сломили и измучали раньше, вырвав из его памяти каждую крупицу полезного знания.

traits.locale_text: There is a seal of silence on the cogitator, but it is not difficult to break it. The machine spirit has been tormented, someone ripped every bit of useful knowledge from its memory.
There is a seal of silence on the cogitator, but it is not difficult to break it. The machine spirit has been tormented, someone ripped every bit of useful knowledge from its memory.
There is a seal of silence on the cogitator, but it is not difficult to break it. The machine spirit has been tormented — someone ripped every bit of useful knowledge from its memory.
There is a seal of silence on the cogitator, but it is not difficult to break it. The machine spirit has been tormented — someone ripped every bit of useful knowledge from its memory.
There is a seal of silence on the cogitator, but it is not difficult to break it. The machine spirit has been tormented — someone ripped every bit of useful knowledge from its memory.

languages.text: 沉思者被施加了沉默封印，但要打破封印并不困难。这台沉思者的机魂遭到了折磨，有人从它的记忆中窃取了所有有用的知识。
languages.original_text: There is a seal of silence on the cogitator, but it is not difficult to break it. The machine spirit has been tormented — someone ripped every bit of useful knowledge from its memory.

traits.locale_text: 思考器被施加了沉默封印，但要打破封印并不困难。这台思考器的机魂遭到了折磨，有人从它的记忆中窃取了所有有用的知识。

languages.text: 考算機には沈黙の封印が施されてはいるものの、解くのは難しくはなかった。機械精霊は酷く痛めつけられており、メモリーから有益な知識は全て奪われていた。
languages.original_text: There is a seal of silence on the cogitator, but it is not difficult to break it. The machine spirit has been tormented — someone ripped every bit of useful knowledge from its memory.

traits.locale_text: 考算機には沈黙の封印が施されてはいるものの、解くのは難しくはなかった。機械精霊は酷く痛めつけられており、メモリーから有益な知識は全て奪われていた。

languages.text: Un sceau de silence a été placé sur le cogitateur, mais il n'est pas difficile à briser. L'esprit de la machine a été tourmenté. Quelqu'un a arraché tout le savoir utile de sa mémoire.
languages.original_text: There is a seal of silence on the cogitator, but it is not difficult to break it. The machine spirit has been tormented — someone ripped every bit of useful knowledge from its memory.

traits.locale_text: Un sceau de silence a été placé sur le cogitateur, mais il n'est pas difficile à briser. L'esprit de la machine a été tourmenté. Quelqu'un a arraché tout le savoir utile de sa mémoire.

languages.text: Este cogitador tiene un sello de silencio, pero no resultaría difícil romperlo. Alguien ha maltratado a este espíritu máquina, eliminando hasta el último dato útil de su memoria.
languages.original_text: There is a seal of silence on the cogitator, but it is not difficult to break it. The machine spirit has been tormented — someone ripped every bit of useful knowledge from its memory.

traits.locale_text: Este cogitador tiene un sello de silencio, pero no resultaría difícil romperlo. Alguien ha maltratado a este espíritu máquina, eliminando hasta el último dato útil de su memoria.

languages.text: Der Cogitator wurde mit einem Siegel des Schweigens belegt, aber es ist nicht schwierig, das Siegel zu brechen. Der Maschinengeist wurde gefoltert ... jemand hat jegliches Wissen aus seinem Speicher gerissen.
languages.original_text: There is a seal of silence on the cogitator, but it is not difficult to break it. The machine spirit has been tormented — someone ripped every bit of useful knowledge from its memory.

traits.locale_text: Der Cogitator wurde mit einem Siegel des Schweigens belegt, aber es ist nicht schwierig, das Siegel zu brechen. Der Maschinengeist wurde gefoltert ... jemand hat jegliches Wissen aus seinem Speicher gerissen.

languages.text: Kavramsayarın üzerinde bir sessizlik mührü var ama kolayca kırılacağı aşikâr. Makine ruhu işkence görmüş, hafızasında işe yarayan zerre kadar irfan bırakmamışlar.
languages.original_text: There is a seal of silence on the cogitator, but it is not difficult to break it. The machine spirit has been tormented — someone ripped every bit of useful knowledge from its memory.
